name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Hyper Potion
rules: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has at least 2 Energy attached. If you healed any damage in this way, discard 2 Energy from it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion Energy
rules: If you play this card from your hand, remove 1 damage counter from the Pokémon you attach it to, if it has any.
Potion Energy provides Colorless energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Super Potion
rules: Discard 1 Energy card attached to your own Pokémon in order to remove up to 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.

name: Super Potion
rules: Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Potion
rules: Remove up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Potion
rules: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (remove 1 damage counter if that Pokémon has only 1).

name: Potion
rules: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (remove 1 damage counter if that Pokémon has only 1).

name: Max Potion
rules: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. Then, discard all Energy attached to that Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Gold Potion
rules: Heal 90 damage from your Active Pokémon.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).
You can't have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.

name: Last Chance Potion
rules: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has 30 HP or less remaining.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Potion
rules: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon (1 if that Pokémon has only 1).

name: Hyper Potion
rules: Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Discard 1 or 2 basic Energy cards attached to that Pokémon. If you discarded 1 Energy card, remove up to 3 damage counters from that Pokémon. If you discarded 2 Energy cards, remove up to 5 damage counters from that Pokémon.

name: Max Potion
